hero.title: Welcome to PQFlow Pro
hero.subtitle: A modern, hassle-free virtual queue experience — join instantly and track your position in real time.

step1.title: 1. Scan or Tap
step1.desc: Scan the QR code or open a provided link to instantly join the queue for a specific service or counter.

step2.title: 2. Get Your Number
step2.desc: Your ticket number is generated automatically — no form or registration required.

step3.title: 3. Wait for Your Turn
step3.desc: Your number will be displayed when it’s called. Track queue progress directly on your device.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.desc: Live ticket calls and position tracking powered by Firebase.

multiCounter.title: Multiple Counters
multiCounter.desc: Tickets can be served by any available counter in your organization.

simpleAdmin.title: Simple Admin
simpleAdmin.desc: Admins can call, skip, or reset tickets from a web dashboard.
